example: Bye-bye, bikinis .

example: Instead, she felt more free, more free because she could wear whatever she wanted under the abaya .

example: Service to Ankara and other points across Turkey is normally offered by Turkish State Railways, but the construction of Marmaray and the Ankara -Istanbul high-speed line forced the station to close in 2012.
